meanings.definition: A person or thing that displays something.
meanings.sent1: The displayers at the art gallery carefully arranged the paintings.
meanings.sent2: The store displayers set up the new products in the window.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous displayers rearranged the classroom decorations as a prank.
meanings.sent4: The displayers of talent shone brightly in the school talent show.
meanings.sent5: The skilled displayers showcased their craftsmanship at the exhibition.

meanings.definition: Those who exhibit or present something.
meanings.sent1: The displayers of courage faced their fears head-on.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayers guided visitors through the exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The enthusiastic displayers cheered on the team with great energy.
meanings.sent4: The displayers of kindness touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The talented displayers wowed the audience with their performance.

meanings.definition: The act of showing or presenting something.
meanings.sent1: The displayers of fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The displayers of talent impressed the judges with their skills.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected displayers of emotion moved the audience to tears.
meanings.sent4: The grand displayers of wealth flaunted their riches at the party.
meanings.sent5: The colorful displayers of flowers brightened up the room.
